item.title: Seeking springbok
item.summary: The |xam hunt springbok. Sentences and Words (B II. 350-353, 363; L II.-1. 196-201, 250 and 251; L II.-4. 476-478); further by /a!k√∫nta (B I. 67-157, etc.; L I.-1. 1-94, 97-114, 118; 2. 120-130, 134-137).
item.comments: 1) Note on the inside of the back cover of this notebook: 'Finished correcting Sept 15/71 from Jantje Toorm himself', 2) This story is found in Book II-1
item.author: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
